title: Highest Percentage of Firms with Female Top Managers
description: In 2016, 64.8% of firms in Thailand had female top managers, one of the highest percentages globally.

title: Most Comprehensive Birth Registration in Urban Areas
description: In 2019, Thailand achieved 100% completeness in birth registration in urban areas, ensuring all urban births are officially recorded.

title: Lowest Proportion of Population Pushed into Poverty by Health Expenses
description: In 2021, only 0.01% of Thailand's population was pushed below the $3.65 poverty line due to out-of-pocket health care expenses, one of the lowest rates worldwide.

title: Lowest Net Official Flows from UNIDO
description: In 2020, Thailand had net official flows from UNIDO amounting to -$2,096,819.92, indicating a net outflow rather than inflow.
